name: Minimalist Instapaper

user.name: Juan Ángel
user.about: I'm an Spanish Journalism student who likes web design.

additional_info:
Version 1, I've done it in a couple of hours so don't expect it to be perfect :P. Reply me at @juanangeldr for any feedback.
  • Responsive -so you can keep it in a side of your screen while you read your saved items.
  • Some elements (sidebar, add link, top menu) show on hover.
  • Option to hide like page and buttons.
  • Browse link, sharing options and "text" button have been removed. Do you think they're necessary? Ask for it.
  • And, as you can see, better look: whiter, wider.
Note: since horizontal scroll bar is hidden, sidebar might not show entirely in lower resolution screens. Tested in Chrome and Firefox, latest versions. I use it with Autopager.
